text: Q #52 | multiple Select Type | Award: 2 | Penalty: 0.0000 || Probability Let E and F be the events that a family of . children has children of both sexes and has at most one boy, respectively. For which of the following value of n, E and F are Not independent? A2 B.3 c.4 D.5 | YourAnower Conectmnwer: G
